participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sporty. She loves being part of a team and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I'm 13 years old. I ride the bus to school. My brother is older than me. I hate math class. I'm on the soccer team.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Passionate and creative. He expresses his feelings through music and enjoys exploring nature.
participant_2.background: My favorite band is Rascal Flatts. We spent summers ringing at national parks. I grew up in the industry. I'm a country music singer.
